title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description:
Gather and document comprehensive project requirements for the NeuralPrivacyGuardian. This includes defining device specifications, identifying user needs, outlining privacy regulations, and considering potential integrations or compatibility requirements. It's crucial to involve cross-functional teams (e.g., security specialists, frontend/backend developers) in this process for a comprehensive understanding of the project scope. To ensure a thorough analysis, consider adding sections for potential scalability needs, performance benchmarks, and long-term maintainability.

Also, please add a section for risk assessment and mitigation strategies related to data privacy and security.

title: Design Neural Privacy Guardian Architecture
description: Create a detailed design of the device architecture, including hardware and software components, communication protocols, and data processing pipelines.

title: Develop Privacy-Preserving Algorithms
description: Research and develop algorithms to protect neural data from unauthorized access or interpretation.

title: Implement Device Hardware and Software Components
description: Develop the hardware and software components based on the project design.

title: Integrate and Test Device Components
description: Combine the hardware and software components, test their functionality, and resolve any issues that arise.
dependencies: Implement Device Hardware and Software Components

title: Prepare User Documentation and Guides
description: Write user documentation and guides for the NeuralPrivacyGuardian, including setup instructions, usage examples, and troubleshooting tips.
dependencies: Implement Device Hardware and Software Components
